cards.content: How do you write '5' in word?
How many head do you have?
So to sum-up, here are the numbers we learned today: 1- one, 2 - two, 3 - three, 4 - four, 5 - five, 6 - six, 7 - seven, 8 - eight, 9 - nine, 10 - ten
This is a ____?
This is a ____?
Rewrite this list in order, from top to bottom: shoulder head legs stomach.
What is the fastest way to move?
How is he feeling?
How is he feeling?
Who operates the controls of an aircraft? The word starts with 'P'.
